TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NodeLabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者完成編輯樹狀節點的文字時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user finishes editing the text for a tree node. 當使用者開始編輯樹狀節點的文字時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user begins editing the text for a tree node. A物件指定要與樹狀目錄節點，包含要編輯標籤的樹狀節點的新文字，並編輯作業是否已取消。A object specifies the new text to associate with the tree node, the tree node that contains the label to edit, and whether the edit operation has been canceled. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以用來更新樹狀節點標籤，來初始化指定 和指定文字的 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified and the specified text with which to update the tree node label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會被指派`node`參數值和屬性會被指派`label`參數值。The property is assigned the `node` parameter value, and the property is assigned the `label` parameter value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CancelEdit { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示是否已經取消編輯。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the edit has been canceled.

value.span: 如果已經取消編輯則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the edit has been canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Label As String
public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與樹狀節點有關的新文字。

span.span: Gets the new text to associate with the tree node.

value.span: 表示新 標籤的字串值；如果使用者取消編輯，則為 。

span.span: The string value that represents the new label or if the user cancels the edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值是`null`如果使用者按下 esc 鍵取消編輯，或按 enter 鍵，而不需修改標籤文字。The value of this property is `null` if the user presses ESC to cancel the edit or presses ENTER without modifying the label text. 如果使用者編輯標籤文字，這個屬性的值會是新的標籤文字。If the user edits the label text, the value of this property is the new label text. 即使已編輯的標籤文字的最後一個值做為其原始值相同，也是如此。This is true even if the final value of edited label text is the same as its original value. ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者藉由編輯非根的樹狀節點。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠，的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取非根的樹狀節點，則它會放入可編輯的狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字評估，以及儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 此範例中，有數個字元視為不在標籤文字中無效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是在標籤字串中，或字串是空的則會通知使用者錯誤的標籤會傳回到其先前的文字。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
